channel.title: Thermotolerance on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Thermotolerance on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaAGL8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAGL8 Gene Name: Agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL8-like protein Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: MADS-box protein AGL8 interacts with chromatin-remodelling component SWC4 to activate thermotolerance and environment-dependent immunity in pepper.

item.title: CaASR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaASR1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaASR1 promotes salicylic acid- but represses jasmonic acid-dependent signaling to enhance the resistance of Capsicum annuum to bacterial wilt by modulating CabZIP63.

item.title: CaCDPK29
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaCDPK29 Gene Name: calcium-dependent protein kinase 29 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A CaCDPK29–CaWRKY27b module promotes CaWRKY40-mediated thermotolerance and immunity to Ralstonia solanacearum in pepper.

item.title: CaHDZ15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHDZ15 Gene Name: HD-Zip I TF 15 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CaHDZ15 promotes pepper basal thermotolerance by activating HEAT SHOCK FACTORA6a.

item.title: CaHsfA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaHsfA2 Gene Name: heat stress transcription factor A2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaHsfA2 was located in the nucleus and had transcriptional activity, consistent with the typical features of Hsfs.

item.title: CaMLO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000221 Gene Symbol: CaMLO1 Gene Name: mildew resistance locus O 1 Genome: Genome assembly Pepper Zunla 1 Ref_v1.

item.title: CaNAC2c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaNAC2c Gene Name: Genome: Pepper.

item.title: CaSWC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaSWC4 Gene Name: SWR1-complex protein 4 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaSWC4 regulates the immunity-thermotolerance tradeoff by recruiting CabZIP63/CaWRKY40 to target genes and activating chromatin in pepper.

item.title: CaWRKY27b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA03g20260 Gene Symbol: CaWRKY27b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A CaCDPK29–CaWRKY27b module promotes CaWRKY40-mediated thermotolerance and immunity to Ralstonia solanacearum in pepper.

item.title: CaWRKY6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaWRKY6 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 6 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaWRKY6 transcriptionally activates CaWRKY40, regulates Ralstonia solanacearum resistance, and confers high-temperature and high-humidity tolerance in pepper.

item.title: GmSPL2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G005600 Gene Symbol: GmSPL2b Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The miR156b–GmSPL2b module mediates male fertility regulation of cytoplasmic male sterility-based restorer line under high-temperature stress in soybean.

item.title: GPAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GPAT Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of Sweet Pepper Glycerol-3-Phosphate Acyltransferase Gene Enhanced Thermotolerance of Photosynthetic Apparatus in Transgenic Tobacco.

item.title: HaDREB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HaDREB2 Gene Name: DREB2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Helianthus annuus Functional Descriptions: The HaDREB2 transcription factor enhances basal thermotolerance and longevity of seeds through functional interaction with HaHSFA9.

item.title: HaHSFA9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HaHSFA9 Gene Name: heat stress transcription factor HSFA9 Genome: Species: Helianthus annuus Functional Descriptions: The HaDREB2 transcription factor enhances basal thermotolerance and longevity of seeds through functional interaction with HaHSFA9.

item.title: MdHsp70
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHsp70 Gene Name: heat shock protein 70 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Elongation factor MdEF-Tu coordinates with heat shock protein MdHsp70 to enhance apple thermotolerance.

item.title: MdVQ37
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1043200 Gene Symbol: MdVQ37 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g49900 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0706900 Gene Symbol: OsRHC1 LE TT3.

item.title: SlHSP21.5A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g113930 Gene Symbol: SlHSP21.5A Gene Name: heat shock protein 21 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: WHIRLY1 Regulates HSP21.

item.title: SlSIZ1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlSIZ1 Gene Name: E3 SUMO-protein ligase SIZ1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SUMO E3 Ligase SlSIZ1 Facilitates Heat Tolerance in Tomato.

item.title: SlSNAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g074910 Gene Symbol: SlSNAT Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identified the SlSNAT gene, which is responsible for melatonin biosynthesis in tomato.

item.title: TaHsfA6b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS4D02G276500 Gene Symbol: TaHsfA6b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of wheat transcription factor (TaHsfA6b) provides thermotolerance in barley.

item.title: TaHsfA6f
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaHsfA6f Gene Name: Heat shock factor A6 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaHsfA6f is a transcriptional activator that regulates a suite of heat stress protection genes in wheat (Triticum aestivum L.
